column1: Little Goat Diner////My friend and I made a reservation at Little Goat for breakfast this morning and were so impressed
column2: both by the service and the quality of food. The waitstaff was super friendly and several precautions were taken (masks
column4: sanitizer) to make the dining experience safe and comfortable. I greatly enjoyed my meal and the dollop of goat milk honey yogurt on top upgraded a would-be basic dish.
